mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (goods_name, goods_imgName, goods_intro, goods_price, stock) VALUES (#{goods_name}, #{goods_imgName}, #{goods_intro}, #{goods_price}, #{stock})
mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_name, goods_intro, goods_price, goods_imgName, stock, goods_imgPath from goods order by goods_id DESC

select goods_id, goods_name, goods_intro, goods_price, goods_imgName, stock, goods_imgPath from goods where goods_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or goods_intro like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by goods_id DESC
select count(*) from goods where goods_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or goods_intro like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
